page.title: 11Notable Events in St. John
page.content:
To celebrate the{40th. anniversary of {the Liberation of the Island}from Occupation by the Germans during World War Two, the parishioners decided to have a grand{party.}It was held in the Recreation Centre on May 11th. 1985.
In the afternoon{games}of rounders, cricket and tug-of-war were organised for the children. The Parish authorities provided everyone with an excellent salad{meal}with chicken, beef and ham. During the meal there were{acts}by the Morris dancers, Karate experts and the members of the St. John's Youth Club who had taken part in the recent Festival of Arts.
Everyone thought it was a most enjoyable day and an appropriate way to celebrate the occasion.
